While scanning maximal frequencies he hears the cry for help. Being 
the humanitarian (Or transformer equivilant) he orders an open 
channel. Foxfingers opens a link with the new bots,"Ready" he says in 
an obedient tone.

"Greetings to unidentified maximals, welcome to what will one day be 
Earth. I offer you sancuary and repairs in my humble labratory. Can 
you follow my signal or do you need medical attention?" (His base is 
in Norway.) the signal went out awaiting a response. "Repeat the 
message until I give the order to stop it or until it's responded 
to." Veratis was anxious to meet all the bots on this planet but was 
to old and weary to travel very far to accomplish such a task. He was 
short handed at the moment and wasn't in a hurry to send Foxfingers 
out again.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@h...> 
wrote:
> 
> * Shadow Cat flies towards the bumbling speck. As she gains speed, 
she 
> notices that the small bot was slowing down. Dumbly, she relizes 
that he 
> wasn't made for such long, high flights. If he kept going too long, 
he would 
> either pass out or crash, and if he's high enough he could get 
seriously 
> damaged. She speed up a bit more, hoping to catch him before such a 
thing 
> occured. The bumbling speck started to droop and go down slowly. 
She dove 
> down and swooped up, catching the little tyke by suprise. And just 
in time 
> too. He was panting and unable to put up much of a fight, and, in 
the end, 
> she flew away with him, cradled in her arms, with some scratches 
and 
> milk-teeth marks.8
> 
> *SNow Tech glanced up as Shadow Cat decended from the air, 
craddling her 
> precious cargo and crooning softly to it so it wouldn't be afraid.
> He sighed and smiled to her when she landed next to him.*
> 
> " You have a way with kids, Shadow, mabey you should think of a 
career in 
> baby-sittin!"
> 
> *Hsadow Cat glared at Snow Tech and smacked him on the arm, but 
when the 
> liitle 'un started to wake, she began crooning again, reduced to 
giving him 
> sideways glares.*
> 
> * NSow Tech grins and turns his back to her, effectivly mooning 
her. He 
> straightens his back and wipes the smile off his face. He presses 
his 
> com-link and broadcasts a signal.*
> 
> " To any Maximals in the vaciniety, we have crashed landed and ask 
for your 
> service. I repeat, we have crash landed and require your services."
> 
> * and after a pause, grins evily and adds,*
> 
> " And we know your out there, we've been watching!"
>
